post.body: Hahaha! Yeah, we're lucky that our little guy is into Fraggle Rock & Curious George right now. Not nearly as annoying.
Maybe Bob and Wendy can fix his attitude. After all, there motto is "Can we fix it? Yes, we can!"
I saw the FedEx guy in shorts yesterday. It was 20° here. WTH?
@whall I love yo-you tricks!
True Blood & Twilight? It's a vamp overload. Oh how I love them all…
Wow. The imagination runs wild with a tweet like that. Apparently, so did the psycho sister-in-law. :)
That's good. I thought she gave off a creepy vibe too. It's what I was going for. :)
Thanks. I think…
I tweeted about ear infections & True Blood. Next thing I knew, an ear monitor co. & Sookie Stackhouse were following me.
That's what I meant. DO you have to connect it with $? What about work w. non-profits? Is the work any less than a pd. job?
My tweet regarding GD should have been before your latest. I was having trouble articulating my thought in 140 characters.
I imagine you have to decide when you "officially" become a designer. Is it when you have your degree, your 1st design job?
What do you think you are?
Wait a minute! I'm made of Awesome. @BeautyIsAnimate declared it so months and months ago. My FB blurb even states this fact.
Um, that should have been yo-yo, not yo-you.
If it wasn't so selfish I'd bring G-tot into bed with me. I want a snuggler and I'm JQ-less tonight.
In my jammies at 8:30 on a Saturday night. Welcome to my life.
New prints in the Bird Doodle Shop. http://birddoodle.etsy.com
I really need to get a worm bin going. I hate to see all that organic scrap matter go to waste.
New blog post: Looking back—the beginning http://snurl.com/9ewg5
